text: A paw is the soft foot of a mammal that has claws or nails. A hard foot is called a hoof. Paws are used to pad feet for walking and reduce friction. == Animals with paws == * Members of the Canidae family, such as dogs and foxes * Felines, such as cats and tigers * Bears and Raccoons * Weasels and other mustelids * Rodents Image:DogDewClawTika1 wb.jpg|A dog's paw resting on a hard concrete surface Image:Panthera tigris11.jpg|A tiger's paw, showing pads Category:Animal anatomy
title: Paw
